addfeed: !addfeed <feed_name> <URL> - Add an RSS/Atom feed to this channel (Admin only).
delfeed: !delfeed <feed_name> - Delete an RSS/Atom feed from this channel (Admin only).
listfeeds: !listfeeds - List all feeds for this channel.
latest: !latest <feed_name> - Show the latest entry from a feed.
getfeed: !getfeed <title_or_domain> - Search for a feed matching the title or domain and display the latest entry.
getadd: !getadd <title_or_domain> - Search for a feed and automatically add it to the channel's feed list.
genfeed: !genfeed <website_url> - Generate an RSS feed for the given website using the rss.app API.
setinterval: !setinterval <minutes> - Set the feed check interval for this channel (Admin only).
search: !search <query> - Search for feeds matching a query.
part: !part <#channel> - Make the bot leave a channel and remove its settings (Admin only).
addnetwork: !addnetwork <server:port> [-ssl] <#channel> <admin> - Connect to another IRC network (bot owner only).
latestsub: !latestsub <feed_name> - Show the latest entry from one of your subscriptions.
stats: !stats - Display uptime, channel feed counts, and user subscription counts.
